title: Poster, 2010-21-22, 1958–1959
markings:
printed in black ink, bottom left corner: CWF (inscribed in small icon like the body of a camera)
printed in black ink, bottom left corner: Stl. 4. ZAM. 772. A-50
printed in black ink, bottom right corner: Films / Paramount (written in cursive), in scribed in Paramount Pictures logo of a mountain with cloud cover around the base, ringed by 24 stars
signed: printed in black ink, top right corner: Flisak (artist's signature)
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: On white background, a darkened photograph of a Roman triumphal arch, with the three horses that should be on top replaced by three men scouting. In the center of the arch is a young dark-haired girl in red skirt, holding a rose carnation. Below center is the title: "RZYMSKIE WAKACJE", flanked by credits above at left and right.
